profile.title: My interative Resume
profile.summary: Fullstack Software Developer with experience in tests automation and frontend and backend developments

statements: Hi, I am Stanley, and I love solving problems.

summary.title: Life is #good, knowlege is #awesome
statement: I am an engineer in life and professionally
I love investigating codes, I see personality in codes, I strive to code better through learning and reading codes
I am a hard work, my approach is work hard to arrive at a smart yet eloquent solution to a problem.
I bring a wide variety of skills and professional experiences to a team.
My goal is to solve problems and make changes that benefit the company, my peers and thus make be a better developer and person.

duties: Implement and execute automated test scenarios to support development
Assist with the implementation of functional and performance testing for the application
Assist with the development of framework to implement End-to-End and Workflow automation for the application
Assist with the deployment and testing during each deployment and release cycle
Execute integration and regression testing as part of product maintenance and quality assurance of the product
Communicate Defects and issues to appropriate team members and colleagues
Assist with the escalation of defects and concerns as appropriate and necessary
Implement proprietary test framework for automation testing utilizing knowledge and experience of:
C# - Selenium Web Driver - NUNIT - MS Test - Spec Flow
Update core software to support behavioral driven development practices
Update core site with new JavaScript and C# components for ease in defect tracking.
Update ASP .Net with new functionality to support testing
Implement framework with C#, JavaScript at its core
Implement framework with various design and programming patterns such as:
Singleton - Repository - Factory - Facade - Iterator
Responsible implementing Jenkins extension with Groovy, Python and Windows Power Shell scripts.
Design and implement codes to support testing web services with  WCF Client and Soap UI
Perform peer to peer code reviews on tests codes and routines
Perform code reviews with Merge Request on Git Lab

experiences.role: Lead Software Developer Engineer in Test
duties: Implement UI Test tools utilizing Object Oriented patterns and knowledge of Rest and XML RPC
Responsible for selecting UI design pattern such as MVVM instead of MVC
Responsible implementing WCF framework to integrate and utilize information and data from various services.
Implement IGT Test Framework to run NUNIT test on game environment
Implement IGT Test Framework agent and service/client to incorporate HP Quality Center (HPC)
Responsible for writing codes on HP Quality Center so that automated tests cases can be run from HPC as well as NUNIT.
Responsible for writing codes to support tests report and RSS Feeds
Maintain existing tools and improved readability of source code.
Perform ad hoc, black box, and white box testing.

experiences.role: Software Quality Analyst / Software Developer Engineer in Test
duties: Implement Test Plans: Write Comprehensive Test Plans including Stress Tests and Creative Tests on Software Components in Gaming Devices. Collect Media, Write Scripts and Applications.

Investigate and characterize Bugs: Investigate probable cause for device defects and software bugs. Identify meticulously such bugs or errors, report issues and trends to appropriate developer and make recommendation for fixes and meeting completion dates. Follow through to resolution.

Write QA Reports: Write detailed reports on the various Tests performed on Gaming Devices. Write functional specifications of the hardware and software components. Report Key features of the software. Prepare Documents for Official Jurisdictional Tests.

Principally my role consisted of assuring that both Hardware and Software system meet industry standards. I verified that the entire Product delivery is functional and ready through various processes including manual and automated tests.
Designed and Implemented Quality Assurance (QA) Test Plans and Strategies.
Developed and Maintained Test Cases, Test scripts, and Test databases.
Maintained accurate and appropriate records on all Tests performed and related results.
Worked with production and development teams to identify problems and meet deadlines.
Provided project status to Management and Interfaced with company associates to determine appropriate software fixes and meet completion deadlines.
Created quality bug reports and tracked defects from submission through closure during test cycle.
Actively participated in the development of a variety of test suites including functional, regression, usability, stress/load, and other tool types as needed.
Worked to ensure the delivery of high quality, virtually defect-free systems and documentation in a timely manner.
Performed troubleshooting on problems that occurred during testing and assisted others with troubleshooting and support of products.
Effectively planned and followed through for product development.
Designed simulations and mathematical models of the Turbo-Decoding Algorithm as a non linear dynamical system.
Presented Technical Report of Project Progress at the Engineering Conferences.
Designed Test Templates in C++ and the Matlab Tool Suite for Result Simulations

experiences.company: Santa Rosa Junior Computer Information Science
duties: Assisted in the conceptual and strategic creation of integrated GUI Websites and Web Solutions using HTML, DHTML, CSS and Action Scripts. Provided end-user support resolving complex software, hardware, network implementations, communications, and operating systems issues.
Provided end-user support resolving complex software, hardware, network implementations, communications, and operating systems issues.
